@brittanystoroz The heartbeat form as written is pretty brittle to schema changes. Same with the parser for the arguments schema itself; it isn't generic enough to handle any argument schema, just the ones we currently have.

On the other hand, I do suspect individual survey fields are the main fields that would change, and the form handles those changing no problem. So it's not entirely brittle. But it's tough having to figure that out vs knowing outright whether there needs to be cahnges or not.

What do you think about dropping the argument-schema parsing completely and just hardcoding the fields?
